short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to check the requests sent to the Coveo Organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of the Coveo Request Checker is to give developers/clients/partners the ability to quickly check and validate the Coveo Requests.
